SVGImageElementDecode.summary:
The decode() method of the
interface initiates asynchronous decoding of an image,
returning a that resolves once the image data is ready
for use.

remarks.para:
-: The same thing, but for HTML
image elements

SVGImageElementDecode.returns:
A which resolves once the image data is ready to be used, such as
by appending it to the DOM, replacing an existing image, and so forth.
